Posts.Content: I have a few questions that I need answers to. I just recently found a lump on my left breast and it causes pain. I went to the walk-in over the weekend to get it checked out. The Dr gave me an antibiotic and ordered an ultrasound and a mammogram which I got done today. The nurses and the radioligst found nothing on both the ultrasound and the mammogram. The lump is there and the pain is starting to bring me to tears. I don't know what to do...
Posts.Title: confused
